Hello.

I'm a recent graduate from Columbia University in the City of New York.


❗️I am actively on the lookout for full-time roles where I can leverage my experience in AI, particularly those that resonate with my dedication to creating a positive impact.❗️

My Interests.

Full Stack Development

As a Full Stack Developer, I'm currently juggling several exciting projects. I'm knee-deep in the development of a Chrome extension popup, where I'm fusing AWS Amplify and its multitude of products like Cognito, Lambda, DynamoDB, IAM, and Elastic Beanstalk with React.js. I'm also dabbling in the world of AI, specifically by harnessing the power of the ChatGPT API and taking it a step further. By integrating it with the Chatsonic API, I've been able to exploit the capabilities of the GPT4 LLM. Another feather in my cap is the website I'm building for Xeward, where I'm meticulously weaving in their upcoming AI products.

Data Science & Machine Learning

My expertise extends to Data Science and Machine Learning, primarily driven by my proficiency in Python development, data analytics, and software engineering. I am adept at using Python APIs to retrieve, process, and analyze data. My skillset includes implementing machine learning algorithms with libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. I have been part of numerous projects, developing algorithms for financial data analysis and decision-making while leveraging cloud technologies to solve complex problems efficiently. I have also managed data transfers and migrations across a range of databases including MySQL, MongoDB, and Neo4j. Most importantly, I'm actively participating in building AI products for Xeward which also stems from my interest in Data Science and ML.
